text:
="preserve">Gisela Raquel Mota Ocampo (13 March 1982 – 2 January 2016) was a Mexican politician. She was a member of the Party of the Democratic Revolution (PRD). She was the mayor of Temixco from 1 January 2016 until her death the next day. She was born in Morelos, Temixco.
Mota Ocampo was shot dead at her home on 2 January 2016 in Pueblo Viejo, aged 33.
